description: After trying to pick up Reki for lunch, Rakka has to go to the temple of the Haibane Renmei; Hikari accompanies her to return the halo mold. Rakka learns that a good Haibane has to find a job, so she starts by helping Reki with the little kids at school. Later, Rakka volunteers to buy pancake as snack after lunch, and "little senpai" Kuu guides her to visit Hikari at work in the bakery.

titles.title: 寺院・話師・パンケーキ
